title: Pett Network
description: Pett Token is a Binance Smart Chain Network-based solution, which connects pet care in blockchain-based tracking platform.

header.title: Pett Network - Pet Care Platform
header.description: Pett Token is a Binance Smart Chain Network-based solution, which connects pet care in blockchain-based tracking platform.

feature.title: New standard in Pet Care Industry
feature.description: Platform of PETT Token will expand to all pet owners, service provider and producing facilities. We make effort to establishing global community.

feature1.title: Kindness
feature1.description: PETT Foundation will support pet care centers that help to solve problems and support animals.

feature2.title: Economical
feature2.description: PETT Token will help pet owners as consumer to achieve appropriate information about the market.

feature3.title: Partnerships
feature3.description: PETT Token Foundation will expand affiliate and partnership through active MOU attempt.

nft.title: PETT Metaverse Platform
nft.description: Own NFT for special holder benefit and get access to the PETT Platform, where users can experience a variety of content related to our lovely pets.

tokenomics.title: Tokenomics
tokenomics.description: The amount of ecosystem circulation depends on the number of users, and the amount of ecosystem circulation is paid to users through staking.

team.title: Team
team.description: Our team consists of high-end experts, whose main aim is to create an innovative platform for Pet Care with distributed infrastructure and partnerships.

roadmap.title: Roadmap
roadmap.description: Our core goal is to enable PETT Token to maintain its purchasing power and scale it to make a Pet Care Industry.
